fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Specify the URL of the Graylog server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: server_url

fields.title: Username
fields.description: Specify the Username used to access the Graylog server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: username

fields.title: Password
fields.description: Specify the Password used to access the Graylog server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: password

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.name: verify_ssl

operations.title: Get Progress Summary for Action Plan
operations.description: Retrieves the current and the past main metrics and indicators of an application for an action plan from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Application Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve progress summary for action plan from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: app_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve progress summary for action plan from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Action Plan Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the action plan for which you want to retrieve progress summary for action plan from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: action_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the action plan for which you want to retrieve progress summary for action plan from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Creation Date
parameters.description: Specify the creation date based on which you want to retrieve progress summary for action plan from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: creation_date
parameters.tooltip: Specify the creation date based on which you want to retrieve progress summary for action plan from Kiuwan.

operations.title: Get Analysis List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of analysis from Kuiwan.

parameters.title: Application Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve analysis from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: app_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve analysis from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Audit Status
parameters.description: Select the status of audit based on which you want to filter the analysis retrieved from Kiuwan. You can choose either OK or FAIL.
parameters.name: audit_status
parameters.tooltip: Select the status of audit based on which you want to filter the analysis retrieved from Kiuwan. You can choose either OK or FAIL.

parameters.title: Count
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this value is set to 500.
parameters.name: count
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this value is set to 500.

parameters.title: Deliveries
parameters.description: Select this option to run deliveries on the analysis results in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: deliveries
parameters.tooltip: Select this option to run deliveries on the analysis results in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Start Time
parameters.description: Specify the starting DateTime from when you want to retrieve analysis from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: start_date
parameters.tooltip: Specify the starting DateTime from when you want to retrieve analysis from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: End Time
parameters.description: Specify the ending DateTime till when you want to retrieve analysis from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: end_date
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ending DateTime till when you want to retrieve analysis from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Page
parameters.description: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say messages starting from the 10th message. By default, this is set as 1.
parameters.name: page
parameters.tooltip: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say messages starting from the 10th message. By default, this is set as 1.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.description: Select the status based on which you want to filter the analysis retrieved from Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: SUCCESS, FAIL, or INPROGRESS.
parameters.name: status
parameters.tooltip: Select the status based on which you want to filter the analysis retrieved from Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: SUCCESS, FAIL, or INPROGRESS.

operations.title: Delete Analysis
operations.description: Delete a specific analysis details from Kiuwan based on the analysis code that you have specified.

parameters.title: Analysis Code
parameters.description: Specify the code of the analysis for which you want to delete a specific analysis in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: analysis_code
parameters.tooltip: Specify the code of the analysis for which you want to delete a specific analysis in Kiuwan.

operations.title: Create Mutes for Rule or File
operations.description: Create a mutes for a rule/file in Kiuwan based on the application name and other parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Application Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the application for which you want to create a mutes for rule/file in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: app_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the application for which you want to create a mutes for rule/file in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Comment
parameters.description: Comment that you want to associate with the specified mute that you want to create in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: comment
parameters.tooltip: Comment that you want to associate with the specified mute that you want to create in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: File Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the file for which you want to create a mutes for rule/file in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: file_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the file for which you want to create a mutes for rule/file in Kiuwan..

parameters.title: File Pattern
parameters.description: Specify a comma-separated list of file pattern for which you want to create a mutes for rule/file in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: file_pattern
parameters.tooltip: Specify a comma-separated list of file pattern for which you want to create a mutes for rule/file in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Rule
parameters.description: Specify the rule code for which you want to create a mutes for rule/file in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: rule
parameters.tooltip: Specify the rule code for which you want to create a mutes for rule/file in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Mute Reason
parameters.description: Specify the mute reason for which you want to create a mutes for rule/file in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: NONE, FALSE_POSITIVE, TOO_MANY_DEFECTS, GENERATED_CODE, TOO_COMPLEX_CODE, or OTHER.
parameters.name: reason
parameters.tooltip: Specify the mute reason for which you want to create a mutes for rule/file in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: NONE, FALSE_POSITIVE, TOO_MANY_DEFECTS, GENERATED_CODE, TOO_COMPLEX_CODE, or OTHER.
